tool_description: VT-Direct is a RESTful API that allows merchants to utilize the Veritrans payment system to process payments. VT-Direct allows customers to complete payment on the merchant’s website without being redirected to Veritrans, and yet still allow the merchant to minimize the security risk inherit with processing card payments. Find out more information about Veritrans at https://veritrans.co.id.
name: Veritrans VT Direct
title: Veritrans VT Direct

api_list.name: 3. Check transaction status
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://veritrans-vtdirect.p.rapidapi.com/status/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "veritrans-vtdirect.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: 4. Cancel transaction
api_list.code:

            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "veritrans-vtdirect.p.rapidapi.com"
